mobileMenu.title: Mobile Menu
mobileMenu.description: Djaouli Entertainment is a boundary-pushing DJ collective from Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire, creating spaces where musical freedom thrives and social barriers dissolve.

item1.title: NOBODY IS WATCHING YOU
item1.description: Let go, breathe, sweat. Here, you have nothing to prove — just enjoy.

item2.title: TOTAL FREEDOM, TOTAL RESPECT
item2.description: We're all here to shine, but not by dimming others. We look out for each other.

item3.title: HERE, BODIES DANCE WITHOUT A MANUAL
item3.description: Consent isn't an option, it's a vibe. We respect each other, we check in, we listen.

item4.title: THE STAGE IS SACRED AND IT BELONGS TO EVERYONE
item4.description: DJ, audience, organizers, friend filming on their phone — everyone brings their energy and that creates the magic.

item5.title: IF YOU CAME TO SIT, YOU MISSED THE ADDRESS
item5.description: Don't come to consume, come to contribute. The dance floor is our temple.

item6.title: DJS ARE NOT JUKEBOXES
item6.description: Let them tell their story. Each DJ has their style, we let ourselves be carried away, let ourselves be surprised.

item7.title: YOU DON'T KNOW THE SONG? EVEN BETTER
item7.description: Be curious. What you hear here, you may never have heard before, but you'll remember it for a long time.

item8.title: YES, YOU CAN SWEAT YOUR LIFE OUT TO ELECTRONIC MUSIC

item9.title: EVERYONE WRITES A PIECE OF THE LEGEND
item9.description: A Djaouli night is a collective affair. Your vibe counts. Your sweat counts.

item10.title: COME AS YOU ARE. THE ONLY DRESS CODE HERE IS ATTITUDE
item10.description: Come with your best mood. No outfit required. No judgment.

item11.title: THE "BÔRÔ" IS A CHOSEN FAMILY
item11.description: Coming alone? You leave with brothers, sisters, vibrant souls. Say hello, smile, connect.
